CustomField.description: Para uso do HDE, campo similar ao CustomerProfile__c do objeto Account, informa se o cliente tem indicador Negativo ou Neutro/Positivo
CustomField.formula: IF(OR(Account.OpenTicketBD__c = true, Account.TDNA__c = true, Account.Recaller__c = true, Account.Bottom__c = true, Account.HighTemperature__c = true, Account.Reincident__c = true, Account.TDNARetention__c = true, Account.TicketBDReincident__c = true, Account.ODC__c = true, Account.NCC__c = true, Account.HDENoContact__c = true, TEXT(Account.CustomerMoodRating__c) = "Sim"), "Cliente com Indicador Negativo", "Cliente com Indicador Neutro/Positivo")
CustomField.label: Perfil do Cliente
